additionalProperty.name: Customizable Reports
additionalProperty.value: Customizable reports in telematics allow users to tailor data analysis to their specific needs, offering insights beyond standard reports. These reports can be created based on various criteria like vehicle, trip, or driver and can include detailed information on fuel usage, driving behavior and more. This flexibility enables businesses to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), track trends and make data-driven decisions for improved efficiency and safety.

additionalProperty.name: Driver's behavior monitoring
additionalProperty.value: A driver behavior monitoring system is a technology-driven solution that continuously tracks and analyzes how drivers operate their vehicles. By using vehicle telematics, GPS and various in-vehicle sensors, the system collects data on driving actions - speed, acceleration, braking and cornering - to provide real-time insights into driver performance.

additionalProperty.name: Real-time Dashcam capture
additionalProperty.value: Real-time dashcam capture is increasingly becoming a valuable feature within telematics systems, enhancing fleet management and safety. By integrating video with traditional telematics data like GPS location, speed and driving behavior, it provides a comprehensive view of vehicle and driver activity, enabling proactive safety measures and efficient incident response.

additionalProperty.name: GPS Tracking
additionalProperty.value: Telematics incorporates GPS tracking as a core component, enabling the monitoring of vehicle location and movement. Telematics systems use GPS data, along with other information from the vehicle's on-board diagnostics, to provide a comprehensive view of vehicle performance and driver behavior. This data is transmitted to a central system where it can be analyzed and used for fleet management, improving efficiency and enhancing safety.

additionalProperty.name: Android (Management)
additionalProperty.value: Telematics management on Android involves using mobile applications to monitor, analyze and manage vehicle data collected by telematics devices. These tools allow for real-time tracking, driver behavior analysis, route optimization and more, enhancing fleet management and overall vehicle operations.

additionalProperty.name: iOS (Management)
additionalProperty.value: Managing telematics on iOS means using apps  to track, analyze and manage vehicle data from telematics devices. These tools give you real-time tracking, insights into driver behavior, route optimization and more - making fleet management and vehicle operations a whole lot smoother.
